name: Ext_R3_RequestGroup_status
title: Cross-version Extension for R3.RequestGroup.status for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents RequestGroup.status from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/RequestGroup|3.0.2 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: draft | active | suspended | cancelled | completed | entered-in-error | unknown
element.definition: The current state of the request. For request groups, the status reflects the status of all the requests in the group.
element.comment: `RequestGroup.status` maps to R4B `RequestGroup.status`. So is mapped as Equivalent.
element.isModifierReason: This extension is a modifier because the target element RequestGroup.status is flagged IsModifier

element.short: draft | active | suspended | cancelled | completed | entered-in-error | unknown
element.definition: The current state of the request. For request groups, the status reflects the status of all the requests in the group.
element.comment: `RequestGroup.status` maps to R4B `RequestGroup.status`. So is mapped as Equivalent.

binding.description: Codes identifying the stage lifecycle stage of a request
